GS41aryabhcu:3095: tathā ca atisūkṣmadṛśaḥ tāvatā abhīṣṭacchāyātikrāntā syāt iti doṣaḥ, etasmāt
GS41aryabhcu:3099: tat yathā ã praśastadārumayaḥ hi asuṣiraḥ rājigranthavraṇavarjitaḥ bhramasiddhaḥ mūlamadhyāgrāntarālatulyavṛttaḥ na alpavyāsaḥ na alpāyāmaḥ ca praśastaḥ /

GS41aryabhcu:3103: avalambakena śaṅkumūlamastakayoḥ madhye vijñāya tadagrasaktam sūtram prasārya ubhayapārśve ca lekhe kuryāt /

GS41aryabhcu:3106: nanu ca atra api doṣaḥ asti eva,

GS41aryabhcu:3119: guruḥ ca bhavati tāvat tāvat vāyunā na eva cālyate,

GS41aryabhcu:6916: grahaiḥ ca nakṣatraiḥ ca kālasya ādiḥ antaḥ ca parikalpyate / tat yathā ã
GS41aryabhcu:6918: tasmāt saṃvatsaraḥ māsāt bārhaspatyaḥ pragaṇyatām // iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6920: loke ca evam vaktāraḥ bhavanti ã “svātau udite prasthāsyāmahe udayaḥ ” iti,
GS41aryabhcu:6931: ṣaṣṭyā sūryābdānām ādityavarṣāṇām ṣaṣṭyā grahāḥ nakṣatrakakṣyām prapūrayanti,
GS41aryabhcu:6932: nakṣatrakakṣyātulyāni yojanāni svāsu svāsu kakṣyāsu gacchanti iti arthaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6933: [kiyadyojanāni] punar nakṣatrakakṣyāyām grahāḥ sūryābdānām ṣaṣṭyā pūrayanti?
GS41aryabhcu:6936: kim tarhi? kā eṣā pratipāditā iti?
GS41aryabhcu:6939: punar etena eva nakṣatrakakṣyātulyāni yojanāni gacchanti iti ucyate?
GS41aryabhcu:6940: yadi khyughṛ-tulyaiḥ arkavarṣaiḥ svān-svān bhagaṇān grahāḥ bhuñjante [tadā] ṣaṣṭyā sūryābdaiḥ kiyantaḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6942: punar ṣaṣṭibhāgena ete[ṣām] khyughṛ-tulyānām arkavarṣāṇām dvāsaptatisahasrāṇi /
GS41aryabhcu:6944: tataḥ punar api ã yadi ekena bhagaṇena pratisvakakṣyā labhyate [tadā] ṣaṣṭyabdabhogena kā iti sarvagrahebhyaḥ nakṣatrakakṣyā
GS41aryabhcu:6950: yasmāt divi sañcaratām grahāṇām ekatra yogaḥ bhavati,
GS41aryabhcu:6951: ataḥ [divyam yugam uktam tena] divyena nabhaḥparidhim /
GS41aryabhcu:6955: nanu ca viyat aparimitayojanapramāṇam iti śrūyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6964: yāvanti yojanāni svakakṣyāyām śaśī saṃcarati tāvanti eva yojanāni ārkiḥ api svakakṣyāyām sañcarati /
GS41aryabhcu:6965: tat yathā ã yadi ekena bhagaṇena svakakṣyā labhyate [tadā] yugabhagaṇaiḥ kim iti khakakṣyā labhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6966: athavā ã ṣaṣṭyabdabhogena nakṣatrakakṣyā labhyate svaiḥ yugabhagaṇaiḥ kim iti khakakṣyā labhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6969: [yuga]bhūdinaiḥ sarve eva svāsu kakṣyāsu samagatyā bhramantaḥ [kha]kakṣyātulyāni yojanāni prayānti,
GS41aryabhcu:6970: ekena ahnā kiyanti iti sarvagrahāṇām yojanagatā dinabhuktiḥ labhyate iti,
GS41aryabhcu:6971: khakakṣyāyām bhūdinaiḥ bhāge hṛte yojanagatā grahāṇām dinabhuktiḥ labhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:6972: tayā trairāśikam bhaṅktvā madhyamagrahāḥ ānīyante ã yadi svakakṣyāyojanaiḥ bhagaṇaḥ labhyate tadā gatiyojanaiḥ kim iti āhnikī bhuktiḥ labhyate,
GS41aryabhcu:6973: tataḥ punar api ã yadi ekena ahnā bhuktiḥ labhyate ahargaṇena
GS41aryabhcu:6974: kim iti / atra ekaḥ pūrvatrairāśike guṇakāraḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6976: ] ataḥ guṇakārabhāgahārayoḥ tulyatvāt naṣṭayoḥ ahargaṇasya dina[gati]yojanāni guṇakāraḥ sthitaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6979: ambarakakṣyā bhūdinahṛtā phalam tatra yojanāni teṣu /
GS41aryabhcu:6981: iti / a[thavā khakakṣyā]hargaṇasaṃvarge svakakṣyābhūdinasaṃvargahṛte bhagaṇādayaḥ bhavanti // 12 //
GS41aryabhcu:6984: maṇḍalam alpam adhastāt kālena alpena pūrayati candraḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6985: upariṣṭāt sarveṣām mahat ca mahatā śanaiḥ cārī // 13 //
GS41aryabhcu:6987: sarveṣām adhaḥ vyavasthitam maṇḍalam alpam alpe[na kālena pūraya]ti candramāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6988: adhastāt iti anena eva maṇḍalasya alpatvasiddhiḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6990: katham adhastāt iti etāvati ucyamāne maṇḍalasya alpatvam gamyate?
GS41aryabhcu:6991: ucyate ã upari upari kakṣyāḥ vyavasthitāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:6992: tāsām upari upari vyavasthitānām adhaḥ yā vyavasthitā sā sarvatanīyasī /
GS41aryabhcu:6996: 15] iti atra kakṣyāṇām upari upari vyavasthitim vakṣyati /
GS41aryabhcu:6997: nanu ca anye bruvate ã sarveṣām upari candramasaḥ kakṣyā iti /
GS41aryabhcu:6999: ] sarveṣām grahāṇām adhaḥ candrakakṣyā iti āha /
GS41aryabhcu:7000: yadi upari syāt tadā candrasya grahanakṣatrabhede sphuṭakalaṅkahariṇe grahanakṣatra[tārāḥ dṛśyeran] /
GS41aryabhcu:7001: sūryavaśāt yadi upari candraḥ syāt tadā sūryeṇa ārāt vyavasthitena sadā candramasoḥ api svasya ārāt bhāgam akhaṇḍam dṛśyeta,
GS41aryabhcu:7005: anye punar sugata[matā]valambinaḥ sūryācandramasoḥ ekām kakṣyām ācakṣate ã
GS41aryabhcu:7007: ardharātraḥ astagamanam madhyāhnaḥ udayaḥ sakṛt // iti //
GS41aryabhcu:7010: ekapañcāśat [yojanāni] sūryaḥ tadā kim iti sūryaḥ [na] mahān upalabhyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7012: atha vidūratvāt arkaḥ na mahān upalakṣyate iti cet na /
GS41aryabhcu:7014: anyat ca tulyakakṣyāvyavasthitatvāt sūryācandramasoḥ sūryagrahaṇam na eva syāt /
GS41aryabhcu:7015: na ca candramasam muktvā anyaḥ rāhuḥ asti yena savitā chādyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7017: syāt tathā api mahattvāt sūryabimbasya na eva arkaḥ sakalaḥ chādyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7018: na eva arkaḥ candreṇa chādyate iti cet tat api uttaratra vyākhyāsyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7021: kim? tat alpam maṇḍalam adhaḥ vyavasthitam /
GS41aryabhcu:7022: upariṣṭāt sarveṣām maṇḍalānām mahat maṇḍalam mahatā kālena śanaiḥ caraḥ pūrayati /
GS41aryabhcu:7025: tat yathā ã candramāḥ divasasaṅkhyayā saptaviṃśatyā sārdhaikayā maṇḍalam gacchati,
GS41aryabhcu:7029: guruḥ] tu varṣaiḥ dvādaśabhiḥ kiñcit ūnaiḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7030: śanaiścaraḥ tu triṃśatā varṣaiḥ kiñcit ūnaiḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:7031: evam ete bhinnakakṣyāsthāḥ yojanagatena tulyagatayaḥ grahāḥ vyākhyātāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7032: atha yadi tulyakakṣyāsthāḥ yojanagatena tulyagatayaḥ eva syuḥ tadā eteṣām yugādeḥ saṃpravṛttānām na kadācit viyogaḥ syāt /
GS41aryabhcu:7033: atha [yadi] yojanagatena ete bhinnagatayaḥ syuḥ tadā eteṣām bhuktiliptānayane yojanaiḥ yathāsvam prasiddhabhuktiliptāḥ na āgaccheyuḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7034: tasmāt bhinnakakṣyāsthāḥ api grahāḥ yojanagatena tulyagatayaḥ eva iti // 13 //
GS41aryabhcu:7036: kakṣyāṇām alpamahattvāt rāśibhāgaliptāḥ bahvyaḥ alpāḥ iti sandehaḥ tannivṛttyartham āha ã
GS41aryabhcu:7037: alpe hi maṇḍale alpāḥ mahati mahāntaḥ ca rāśayaḥ jñeyāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7038: aṃśāḥ kalāḥ tathā evam vibhāgatulyāḥ svakakṣyāsu // 14 //
GS41aryabhcu:7039: alpe maṇḍale alpāḥ rāśayaḥ mahati maṇḍale mahāntaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7042: tat yathā ã alpe mahati ca maṇḍale maṇḍaladvādaśabhāgaḥ rāśiḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7047: kakṣyāṇām upari adhaḥ ava[sthiti]kramaparijñānāya āha ã
GS41aryabhcu:7049: eṣām adhaḥ ca bhūmiḥ medhībhūtā khamadhyasthā // 15 //
GS41aryabhcu:7058: atra “bhūta“-śabdaḥ bahuṣu artheṣu vartamānaḥ iva arthe pratipattavyaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7067: yadā ataḥ anyeṣu grahanakṣatrāṇi smararipusutahibukasahajadhaneṣu vartante tadā katham adhaḥ bhūḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7075: tadvat hi sarvasattvaiḥ jalajaiḥ sthalajaiḥ ca bhūgolaḥ // iti /
GS41aryabhcu:7079: tat yathā ã yā]vat alpamaṇḍalam bhāni bhramanti,
GS41aryabhcu:7080: tāvat mahānti maṇḍalāni śanaiścarādayaḥ [na] śaknuvanti pūrayitum iti pṛṣṭhataḥ lakṣyante,
GS41aryabhcu:7082: atra parihāraḥ prāk pradarśitaḥ ã yadi upari syāt tadā candrasya grahanakṣatrabhede sphuṭakalaṅkahariṇe grahanakṣatratārāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:7086: ataḥ drutagatibhiḥ nakṣatraiḥ īṣamandagatiḥ īṣat jīyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7090: atra api yadi prāṅmukhāḥ grahādayaḥ tadā prāṅmukhaiḥ drutagatibhiḥ nakṣatraiḥ jīyamānaḥ aśvinyām dṛṣṭaḥ revatyām upalakṣyeta,
GS41aryabhcu:7092: api ca, pratilomagatitvāt aśvinyām dṛṣṭaḥ bharaṇyām eva upalakṣyeta /
GS41aryabhcu:7094: tathā api vakrakāle aśvinyām dṛṣṭaḥ pratilomagatitvāt bharaṇyām upalakṣyeta /
GS41aryabhcu:7096: anyat ca ã anyonyabimbacchādanam na syāt /
GS41aryabhcu:7097: grahoparāgaḥ api ca tulyakakṣyāvyavasthitatvāt na yujyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7098: tasmāt “bhānām adhaḥ śanaiścaraḥ” iti ādi suṣṭhu uktam // 15 //
GS41aryabhcu:7101: sapta ete horeśāḥ śanaiścarādyāḥ yathākramam śīghrāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7103: ete grahāḥ śanaiścarādayaḥ tulyagatayaḥ api santaḥ yathākrameṇa śīghrāḥ lakṣyante,
GS41aryabhcu:7106: tat yathā ã śanaiścarasya kālahorāyām nivṛttāyām bṛhaspateḥ kālahorā,
GS41aryabhcu:7109: evam sūryodayāt prabhṛti yāvat sūryasya ardhāstamayaḥ iti dvādaśa kālahorāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7110: tataḥ ca ardhāstamayāt ardhodayaḥ iti punar dvādaśa /
GS41aryabhcu:7114: sā ca divase divase divasādhipātaḥ prabhṛti pratipattavyā /
GS41aryabhcu:7117: horeśvarāḥ taddivasādhipādikrameṇa tāḥ tatra caturguṇāḥ ṣaṭ //
GS41aryabhcu:7118: evam divasādhipāt sūryodayāt gaṇyamānāt uttaradivasasya adhipāt eva ardhodayāt śīghrakramāt caturthaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7119: yaḥ śīghrakramaḥ abhihitaḥ “bhānām adhaḥ śanaiścaraḥ” iti ādi tasmāt caturthaḥ divasādhipatiḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7120: tat yathā ã śanaiścarāt caturthaḥ sūryaḥ divasādhipatiḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7123: evam anena krameṇa māsādhipāḥ abdādhipāḥ ca avagantavyāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7124: katham? [māsasya varṣasya ca yaḥ] prathamadivase adhipaḥ sa māsādhipaḥ varṣādhipaḥ ca
GS41aryabhcu:7127: yadi api śeṣeṇa uktaḥ sūryodayaśeṣeṇa ardhodayaḥ pratipattavyaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7128: kutaḥ? idam bimbāvayavābhidhāne api tadavayavapramāṇasya mānakālāvadhāraṇāśakyatvāt ardhodayasya ca vyaktalakṣaṇatvāt suparicchedanayā ardhodayaḥ āśriyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7129: athavā anirdiṣṭeṣu vastuṣu madhyamapratipatteḥ ardhodayāt ārabhya punar ardhodayaḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:7137: yadā protpannaḥ sahasrakiraṇaḥ tadā prabhṛti vārādivyavahāraḥ sañjātaḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:7138: ataḥ suṣṭhu uktam sūryodayāt dinapāḥ iti // 16 //
GS41aryabhcu:7140: ete grahāḥ kasmin maṇḍale bhramanti iti [na jñāyate] ataḥ tannirūpaṇāya āha ã
GS41aryabhcu:7142: mandoccāt anulomam pratilomam ca eva śīghhroccāt // 17 //
GS41aryabhcu:7145: athavā kakṣyā ca pratimaṇḍalam ca kakṣyāpratimaṇḍale,
GS41aryabhcu:7149: athavā kakṣyāpratimaṇḍalayoḥ yatra sampātaḥ sa kakṣyāpratimaṇḍalaśabdena ucyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7153: ucyate ã kakṣyā ca pratimaṇḍalam ca kakṣyāpratimaṇḍale /
GS41aryabhcu:7156: katham? iṣṭatvāt śeṣavigrahārthavācakatvāt ca atra iṣyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7165: na evam vijñāyate madhyamaḥ grahaḥ sphuṭaḥ grahaḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:7169: tat yathā ã kaścit sāṃvatsaram pṛcchati ã “kaḥ savitā” iti,
GS41aryabhcu:7171: ekaḥ pañcadaśa bhāgāḥ triṃśat liptāḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:7172: tatra yaḥ paripṛcchati yaḥ ca ācaṣṭe tayoḥ ubhayoḥ abhi[prāya]dvayaprasaṅgaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7174: yā madhyamā gatiḥ sā sphuṭagatisādhanasya upāyaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7175: anyathā aniyatatvāt sphuṭagatiḥ aśakyā syāt vijñātum /
GS41aryabhcu:7177: yat asya grahasya vyāsārdhatulyam bhūtārāgrahavivaram sa tasmāt pradeśāt prabhṛti kakṣyāmaṇḍalasya upari adhaḥ vā avatiṣṭhate /
GS41aryabhcu:7179: ucyate ã yadā tṛtīye karmaṇi dvitīye pade mandoccakendram rāśitrayam dvau bhāgau pañcāśat liptāḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7181: caturthe karmaṇi yadā śīghroccakendram rāśitrayam pañcabhāgāḥ viṃśatiḥ ca kalā,
GS41aryabhcu:7184: asmāt pradeśāt prabhṛti bhūtārāgrahavivaram pratidinam apacīyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7187: bhramanti sarve grahāḥ svacāreṇa iti etat nigadavyākhyānam eva /
GS41aryabhcu:7190: tena mandoccāt hetoḥ anulomam iti vyākhyāyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7196: ucyate ã yadā śīghroccakendram dvitīyapade tadā sarve grahāḥ vakriṇaḥ bhavanti,
GS41aryabhcu:7200: bhavet vakrātivakrā ca tathā anukuṭilā gatiḥ //
GS41aryabhcu:7202: ucyate ã yadā adyatanāt grahāt śvastanaḥ grahaḥ tulyaḥ bhavati tadā vakraprārambhaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7203: athavā hyastanāt grahāt adyatanaḥ grahaḥ tulyaḥ tadā api vakraprārambhaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7204: yadā adyatanāt tṛtīyapade śvastanaḥ grahaḥ adhikaḥ tadā vakrasya nivṛttiḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7205: athavā hyastanāt grahāt adyatanaḥ grahaḥ adhikaḥ tṛtīyapade tadā api vakrasya nivṛttiḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7206: yadā grahaḥ bahvīḥ liptāḥ nivartate tadā ativakragatiḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7207: katham punar idam vidhānam śīghroccāt eva gaṇakaḥ prajānate,
GS41aryabhcu:7209: ucyate ã yasmāt sūryavaśāt grahāṇām udayāstamayavakrānuvakrāḥ gatayaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7210: yadi evam atra katham budhaśukrayoḥ anyat śīghroccam,
GS41aryabhcu:7212: atra api sūryavaśāt eva tayoḥ udayāstamayaparijñānam /
GS41aryabhcu:7214: athavā uccanīcamadhyamaparidhiḥ iti evamādisphuṭagatisādhanopāya[bhūtānām ca] upāyānām na [eva niyamo]ktiḥ
GS41aryabhcu:7215: vā vidyate / kevalam tu upeyasādhakāḥ upāyāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7219: tathā hi bhiṣajaḥ hi utpalanālādiṣu vadhādīni abhyasyante /
GS41aryabhcu:7225: tasmāt upāyeṣu asatyeṣu satyapratipādanapareṣu na codyam asti /
GS41aryabhcu:7226: atha kim artham ime grahāḥ pratidinam bhrāmyanti /
GS41aryabhcu:7227: atha ca loke kaścit bhraman kāraṇena bhramati /
GS41aryabhcu:7228: anyat ca ã na evaṃvidhaḥ kaścit dṛśyate anavaratagatiḥ yathā ime tārāgrahāḥ bhramanti iti dṛṣṭāntatvena udāharaṇabhūtaḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:7229: ucyate ã sarvādau kila bhagavān prajāpatiḥ grahān uktavān yat “bhavantaḥ meṣādigaṇeṣu prajānām śubhāśubhaphalāya bhrāmyata” iti /
GS41aryabhcu:7240: śrūyante ca śabdāḥ ye ca apare atra gativācakāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7243: 5.1.76] iti anena nityam panthānam gacchati iti asmin arthe pānthaḥ iti ayam śabdaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7244: atra loke na kaścit adhvānam anavaratam gacchan dṛśyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7246: na ca ayam śabdaḥ asatsvārtheṣu śaśaviṣāṇakūrmaromavandhyāputraśabdavat pravṛttaḥ / tasmāt
GS41aryabhcu:7247: suṣṭhu ucyate śabdena arthānumānam pānthāḥ grahāḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:7249: mandoccāt anulomam pratilomam ca eva śīghroccāt /
GS41aryabhcu:7250: mandoccāt yataḥ mandoccakendrāt pratimaṇḍalavidhānena ānītam phalam pratyaham upacīyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7254: yasmāt pratimaṇḍalavidhānena ānītam phalam sarvadā apacīyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7260: kakṣyāmaṇḍalatulyam svam svam pratimaṇḍalam bhavati eṣām /
GS41aryabhcu:7266: svam svam pratimaṇḍalam ātmīyam ātmīyam pratimaṇḍalam, bhavati /
GS41aryabhcu:7269: yat madhyam kendram tat ghanabhūmadhyāt atikrāntam /
GS41aryabhcu:7270: ghanāḥ ca asau bhūḥ ca ghanabhūḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7274: tat yathā ã yāvat pramāṇaparikalpitam ṣaṣṭiśatatrayāṃśāvacchinnam kakṣyāmaṇḍalam pūrvāparam ūrdhvam vinyasya,
GS41aryabhcu:7275: tādṛś eva anyat maṇḍalam upari adhaḥ kakṣyāmaṇḍalāt vakṣyamāṇena antareṇa pūrvāparayoḥ diśoḥ yatra sampātaḥ tatra yat badhyate gole tatpratimaṇḍalam nāma /
GS41aryabhcu:7280: vṛttaparidhau grahāḥ te madhyamacārāt bhramanti evam // 19 //
GS41aryabhcu:7286: tat yathā ã “jhārdhāni mandavṛttam” iti adhikṛtya “śaśinaḥ cha” [gītikāí,
GS41aryabhcu:7291: 10] iti evamādeḥ paridheḥ ayutatulyam vyāsārdham labhyate tadā sārdhaikatriṃśadbhāgapramāṇasya paridheḥ kim iti labdham bhāgāḥ pañca,
GS41aryabhcu:7295: tasya ca trairāśikena svavṛttaviṣkambhārdham labdham bhāgadvayam,
GS41aryabhcu:7298: vyāsārdham labhyate tadā uccanīcaparidheḥ kim iti labdham candrasya uccanīcavyāsārdham liptātriśatī sārdhādhikarūpā /
GS41aryabhcu:7300: tatra bhāgapramāṇena liptāpramāṇena vā kakṣyāpratimaṇḍalamadhyāntaram parikalpyam /
GS41aryabhcu:7302: anyathā anyeṣām samaviṣamavṛttamandoccaśīghroccabhedena anekapratimaṇḍalaprasaṅgabhayāt uttaratra vakṣyati ã “bhūtārāgrahavivaram” [kālakriyāí, 25] iti /
GS41aryabhcu:7306: pratimaṇḍaleṣu sphuṭacāram bhramanti iti arthāt avasīyate // 19 //
GS41aryabhcu:7310: anulomagatiḥ vṛtte mandagatiḥ yaḥ grahaḥ bhavati // 20 //
GS41aryabhcu:7312: śīghragatiḥ ca tat svoccam ca śīghragatiḥ svoccam,
GS41aryabhcu:7315_1: tadā sā eva sphuṭamadhyamā bhuktiḥ svakendrāntajyāsādhitā svaśīghroccabhukteḥ pratilome[na] pātyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7320: pratilomā gatiḥ yasya saḥ pratilomagatiḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:7321: āditaḥ eva etat bhuktyānayanam prati vakṣyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7322: tat yathā ã mandoccakendrāntajyām krameṇa utkrameṇa vā niṣpannām svamadhyamabhuktiliptābhiḥ guṇayet /
GS41aryabhcu:7323_0: punar ca tat kālapratidhinā guṇitasya aṣṭādaśabhiḥ sahasraiḥ bhāgalabdham kendrapadavaśāt
GS41aryabhcu:7323_1: ardhīkṛtya grahamadhyamabhuktiliptāsu prakṣipya viśodhya vā svaśīghroccabhuktiliptābhiḥ śodhayet /
GS41aryabhcu:7329: tataḥ tam kṣiptaviśodhitaśeṣam gṛhītvā tṛtīyakarma ã mandoccakendrāntajyākramotkramajyām tat kālaparidhiguṇam aṣṭādaśabhiḥ sahasraiḥ vibhajet /
GS41aryabhcu:7330: labdham samastam eva grahamadhyamabhuktiliptāsu mandakendrapadavaśāt kṣipet,
GS41aryabhcu:7334: śeṣam [gṛhītvā] caturthakarma ã śīghroccakendrānta[jyākramotkrama]jyām tat kālaparidhiguṇam aṣṭādaśabhiḥ sahasraiḥ vibhajet /
GS41aryabhcu:7336: tatra yad avāptam tat yadi kṣepyam sphuṭamadhyamabhuktiliptāsu kṣipet,
GS41aryabhcu:7338: atha viśodhyam sad yadi sphuṭamadhyamabhuktitaḥ na patati tadā pratilomagatiḥ grahaḥ sphuṭamadhyamabhuktiliptāḥ eva viparītam
GS41aryabhcu:7345: yadā śīghroccāt śīghroccakendrāntajyāniṣpannā liptāḥ sphuṭamadhyamabhuktiliptābhyaḥ viśuddhāḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7348: tataḥ arthāt ayam vigrahaḥ avasitaḥ ã anulomā gatiḥ yasya sa anulomagatiḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:7349: sa ca alpam gaccahati iti mandagatiḥ abhidhīyate // 20 //
GS41aryabhcu:7357: tat atra api śīghroccāvadheḥ madhyamāt iti etat ekaprakrameṇa bhavitavyam /
GS41aryabhcu:7358: na iti āha ã śīghrā[t pratilomaga]tiḥ pratilomāvadheḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7359: śīghroccasya pratilomagatīni viparītagatīni yāni vṛttāni paridhayaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7360: atra vṛttasya ekadeśe vṛttaśabdopa[cārāt paridhayaḥ ca] iti,
GS41aryabhcu:7362: ataḥ tāni dhanūṃṣi mandakendrāt jātāni krameṇa
GS41aryabhcu:7366: katham punar vṛttāni mandaśīghrakendrayoḥ tajjyādhanūṃṣi kramotkrama[gatīni?
GS41aryabhcu:7368: gatiḥ asti iti bhūtānām sukumārāyate manaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7369: [anastvaniśam eva ūḍham dhuram] vahati gauḥ iva //
GS41aryabhcu:7371: dānam bhogaḥ nāśaḥ tisraḥ gatayaḥ bhavanti vittasya /
GS41aryabhcu:7372: yaḥ na dadāti na bhuṅkte tasya tṛtīyā gatiḥ bhavati //
GS41aryabhcu:7375: tasmāt yāni eva jyādhanūṃṣi tāni eva pratilomānulomagatīni /
GS41aryabhcu:7376: atha atra idam praṣṭavyam ã mandoccajyādhanūṃṣi mandoccāt upacīyante,
GS41aryabhcu:7386: ayam āryāsūtrārthaḥ yathā ghaṭate tathā karmaṇā pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7388: śeṣam rāśyādikam mandoccāt pravṛttam tat kakṣyāmaṇḍalotpannam iti pratimaṇḍale kriyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7390: tena tasmāt mandoccāt ārabhya yat kāṣṭham tat mahati maṇḍale alpam bhavati /
GS41aryabhcu:7393: alpe pratimaṇḍale tat eva kāṣṭham bahutaram
GS41aryabhcu:7395: vrīhyādayaḥ mahatā mānaviśeṣeṇa pramīyamānāḥ prasthādisaṅkhyayā alpāḥ bhavanti,
GS41aryabhcu:7396: [te] eva alpena mānaviśeṣeṇa mīyamānāḥ prasthādiśaṅkhyayā bahavaḥ bhavanti evam atra api /
GS41aryabhcu:7397: katham punar tat kāṣṭham kakṣyāmaṇḍalotpannam pratimaṇḍale pramīyate?
GS41aryabhcu:7398: ucyate ã tat kāṣṭhasya padāni vyatītāni pratyākalayya vartamānapadasya bhujākoṭijyayā karma idam kriyate ã “pratimaṇḍalasya madhyam ghanabhūmadhyāt atikrāntam” [kālakriyāí,
GS41aryabhcu:7399: 18] iti pratimaṇḍalabhūvivaram koṭyām prathamacaturthayoḥ padayoḥ prakṣipyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7401: etat pratipādanārtham samāyāmavanau vṛttakendram nidhāya yāvat tāvat pramāṇaparikalpitavyāsārdhapramāṇena karkaṭakena vṛttam ālikhet /
GS41aryabhcu:7402_1: [sūtram mandoccābhimukham] dakṣiṇena nidhāya tatra kakṣyāmaṇḍalavyāsārdhatulyakarkaṭakena vṛttam ālikhet /
GS41aryabhcu:7406: adhaḥ / tatra yā koṭijyā sā kakṣyāmaṇḍalotpannā kakṣyāmaṇḍalabhūmyantarālapramāṇā /
GS41aryabhcu:7407: tena pratimaṇḍalabhūvivarāntarālamātreṇa pratimaṇḍalam prathamacaturthayoḥ padayoḥ koṭiḥ na prāpnoti iti prakṣipyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7408: dvitīyatṛtīyapadayoḥ tāvatā atītāt pratimaṇḍalāt koṭiḥ iti apanīyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7410: atha yadi koṭi[jyātaḥ] pratimaṇḍalabhūvivaram na śudhyati,
GS41aryabhcu:7413: / tatra evam niṣpannāyāḥ koṭeḥ bhujajyāyāḥ ca vargasamāsamūlam karṇaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7416: tat yadi vyāsārdhatulyena pratimaṇḍalakarṇena yathā uktam pratimaṇḍalabhūvivaram labhyate tadā tena pratimaṇḍalakarṇena kim iti /
GS41aryabhcu:7419: tena punar pratimaṇḍalabhūvivarānayanam iti yāvat aviśeṣaḥ / tataḥ
GS41aryabhcu:7420: aviśiṣṭakarṇena vyastatrairāśikam kriyate ã yadi vyāsārdhaviṣkambhasya kakṣyāmaṇḍalasya iyam bhujajyā labhyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7421: tadā tena karṇena pratimaṇḍalajena kā iti /
GS41aryabhcu:7425: tat kāṣṭham mandocce prakṣipya sphuṭaḥ grahaḥ bhavati,
GS41aryabhcu:7427: dvitīyapade ṣaḍbhyaḥ rāśibhyaḥ viśodhya bhujā gṛhītā iti ṣaṅbhyaḥ apanīyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7429: tṛtīyapade cakrārdhādhikabhujā iti tat cāpam cakrārdhasahitam mandocce prakṣipyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7430: caturthapade dvādaśebhyaḥ viśuddhaśeṣam bhujā iti cakrāt tat kāṣṭham viśodhya śeṣam mandocce prakṣipyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7433: yeṣām punar śīghroccam vidyate teṣām karmaviśeṣaḥ ucyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7434: tat yathā ã paridhicālanāprayogeṇa sphuṭīkṛtaparidhinā vyāsārdham samguṇayya aśītyā bhāgalabdham pratimaṇḍalabhūvivaram mandaśīghroccayoḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7438: madhyamasya grahasya [ca] yat antarārdham tat madhyamāt mandoccasiddhe adhike madhyamagrahe dhanam, ūne ṛṇam
GS41aryabhcu:7440: etat eva karma “śanigurukujeṣu mande ardham ṛṇadhanam bhavati pūrvam” [kālakriyāí,
GS41aryabhcu:7443: mandāraguruṣu madhyameṣu madhyamakarmaṇā siddheṣu mandāraguruṣu iti arthaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7445: 22] iti kasya ardham ṛṇam dhanam vā bhavati iti atra sampradāyāvicchedāt mandasiddhamadhyamāntaram parigṛhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7447: dhanam ṛṇam vā pūrvasiddhe mandoccakarmaṇi bhavati?
GS41aryabhcu:7448: idam ca karma mandoccaśīghroccayoḥ sāmānyena prasiddham /
GS41aryabhcu:7450: tat yathā ã evam ardhena phalena saṃskṛtam madhyamam graham śīghroccāt grahāt viśodhayet /
GS41aryabhcu:7451_0: tatra kendrapadavibhāgena bhujākoṭijye gṛhītvā sphuṭīkṛtasvaśīghroccaparidhinā vyāsārdham
GS41aryabhcu:7451_1: saṃguṇayya aśītyā bhāgalabdhapratimaṇḍalabhūvivareṇa pūrvakarmaṇā eva saṃskṛtāt karṇam ānayet /
GS41aryabhcu:7454: tataḥ bhujajyayā vyāsārdham saṃguṇayya karṇena bhāgalabdhasya kāṣṭham śīghroccakendre prathamapade śīghroccāt apanīyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7455: dvitīye pade ṣaḍbhyaḥ viśodhya śeṣam śīghroccāt apanīyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7460: tasya mandoccasiddhasya ca pūrvavat eva antarārdham mandoccasiddhe pūrvakalpanayā
GS41aryabhcu:7462: tat mandaśīghra[siddha]m avinaṣṭam vidhāya tasmāt mandoccam viśodhya pūrvavat eva mandoccam sādhayet /
GS41aryabhcu:7463: tasya mandoccasiddhasya dvisaṃskṛtasya avinaṣṭasthāpitasya ca yaḥ viśeṣaḥ tam sakalam eva dvisaṃskṛtahīnamadhyamāt viśodhayet,
GS41aryabhcu:7465: [arthāt dvisaṃskṛtamandasiddhe ūne sati viśodhayet anyathā prakṣipet] /
GS41aryabhcu:7466: tam evaṃkṛtam śīghroccāt viśodhya śīghroccaprasiddhakarmaṇā saṃsiddhaḥ sphuṭaḥ grahaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS41aryabhcu:7467: iti / etat eva karma saṃkṣepeṇa asmābhiḥ karmanibandhe uktam ã
GS41aryabhcu:7469: mandocce pūrvavat kuryāt śīghroccāt tat viśodhyate //
GS41aryabhcu:7470: tat eva kevalam śodhyam [cakrārdhāt śodhya tat calāt] /
GS41aryabhcu:7471: cakrārdhasaṃyutam cāpam cakrāt śuddham ca śeṣayoḥ //
GS41aryabhcu:7473: tyaktvā padeṣu yuktvā vā karṇaḥ prāgvat prasādhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7475: mandasiddhe adhike hīne rahitaḥ madhyamaḥ grahaḥ //
GS41aryabhcu:7476: sa śīghroccāt punar sādhyaḥ siddhayoḥ antarālajam /
GS41aryabhcu:7479: mandasiddhasya tasya ayam viśeṣaḥ yaḥ abhidhāsyate //
GS41aryabhcu:7481: prāgvat tat madhyame kṛtvā śīghrasiddhaḥ sphuṭaḥ grahaḥ //
GS41aryabhcu:7484: tena budhaśukrayoḥ api idam karma kriyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7489: kakṣyāmaṇḍalalagnam ca tat svavṛttamadhyam ca kakṣyāmaṇḍalalagnasvavṛttamadhyam /
GS41aryabhcu:7492: yaḥ asau madhyaḥ grahaḥ sa kakṣyāmaṇḍalalagnasvavṛttamadhye bhavati /
GS41aryabhcu:7493: etat uktam bhavati ã kakṣyāpratimaṇḍalayoḥ yatra sampātaḥ tatra yaḥ asau madhyamagrahaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7501: mandoccāt prabhṛti yāni mandoccavṛttāni mandoccāt ārabhya anulomam gacchanti,
GS41aryabhcu:7504: śīghrāt śīghroccāt ārabhya yāni śīghroccavṛttāni tāni pratilomam gacchanti,
GS41aryabhcu:7506: atra idam praṣṭavyam ã katham vā mandoccakendram
GS41aryabhcu:7508: katham vā śīghroccakendram ahar ahar apacīyate iti?
GS41aryabhcu:7509: ucyate ã grahāt patite mandocce [mandakendra]bhuktayaḥ upacīyante,
GS41aryabhcu:7511: yadi evam grahāt śīghroccam na patati mahattvāt tarhi maṇḍalam prakṣipya pātyate iti /
GS41aryabhcu:7516: tatra grahabhagaṇebhyaḥ śīghroccabhagaṇāḥ eva tāvat na
GS41aryabhcu:7518: kutaḥ asau bhagaṇaḥ yam prakṣipya śīghroccam viśodhyate?
GS41aryabhcu:7519: tasmāt gaṇitayuktyā yāni api śīghravṛttāni tāni api anulomagāni eva /
GS41aryabhcu:7520: ācāryeṇa tu karaṇalāghavārtham “pratilomagāni vṛttāni” iti uktam /
GS41aryabhcu:7522: yadi grahaḥ śīghroccāt patati tadā grahaḥ śīghroccāt viśodhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7523: yadā ca śīghroccam grahāt patati tadā grahāt śīghroccam viśodhyate iti /
GS41aryabhcu:7527: viśodhitam bhavati tadā anyathā jyā anyathā paridhiḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7528: tadānīm eva śīghroccāt viśuddhe grahe anyathā jyā anyathā eva paridhiḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7529: atha manyate śīghroccaviśuddhe grahe yat prathamapadam tat caturthapadam,
GS41aryabhcu:7539: athavā kakṣyā ca sā maṇḍalam ca tat kakṣyāmaṇḍalam /
GS41aryabhcu:7544: tat ca sāmānyena mandavṛttam śīghravṛttam ca parigṛhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7550: tasmin svavṛtte yathā kakṣyāmaṇḍale yathā madhyam bhavati tathā badhnīyāt /
GS41aryabhcu:7551: tasmin svavṛtte yathā kakṣyāmaṇḍale jyā avitiṣṭhate tathā eva avatiṣṭhamānā draṣṭavyā /
GS41aryabhcu:7553: evam atra api ṣaṇṇavatyaṃśakā kāṣṭhajyā parikalpanīyā /
GS41aryabhcu:7554: tat yathā ã uccāt ārabhya bhujajyākoṭijyābhyām trairāśikam ã yadi ṣaṣṭiśatatrayaparidhau ime bhujajyākoṭijye,
GS41aryabhcu:7556: ke iti / athavā ã vyāsārdhena ime bhujajyākoṭijye,
GS41aryabhcu:7559: tatra prathamacaturthayoḥ padayoḥ vyāsārdhāt upari koṭisādhanam sthitam iti vyāsārdhe prakṣipyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7560: dvitīyatṛtīyayoḥ padayoḥ vyāsārdhonam pravṛttam iti vyāsārdhāt apanīyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7567: śanigurukujeṣu mandāt ardham ṛṇam dhanam bhavati pūrve // 22 //
GS41aryabhcu:7569: kṣayaḥ ca dhanaḥ ca dhanaḥ ca kṣayaḥ ca kṣayadhanadhanakṣayāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7571: tat yathā ã prathame pade kṣayaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7576: padakramaḥ ca kasmāt parigṛhyate iti āha ã mandoccāt pravṛttāt grahāt /
GS41aryabhcu:7577: kutaḥ? ucyate ã “mandoccāt” iyam pañcamī maryādābhidhāyinī /
GS41aryabhcu:7578: tataḥ mandoccāt iti anena mandoccāt pravṛttaḥ grahaḥ parigṛhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7579: sa katham mandoccāt pravṛttaḥ grahaḥ jñeyaḥ?
GS41aryabhcu:7580: ucyate ã na atra kiñcit api jñeyam /
GS41aryabhcu:7581: yāvadbhiḥ mandoccāt adhikaḥ grahaḥ tavatā asau mandoccāt pravṛttaḥ grahaḥ jñeyaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7585: tasmāt prathamapade yā kramajyā tasyāḥ phalam trairāśikena ānīyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7587: tadā iṣṭagrahaparidheḥ kā iti phalam labhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7596: punar tṛtīyapade krameṇa jyā vyavasthitā iti kramajyāphalam dhanam /
GS41aryabhcu:7597: caturthe pade utkrameṇa jyā vyavasthitā iti utkramajyāphalam kṣayaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7599: tat utpannam eva phalam grahamadhye kṣayaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7600: yadā dvitīyapade kendram tadā prathamapadavyāsārdhajyotpannam aśeṣaphalam kṣayaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7603: athavā karaṇalāghavārtham evam kriyate ã prathamapade yat utpannam krameṇa jyāphalam kṣayaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7604_0: dvitīyapade yat utpannam punar yat gatam rāśyādikam atītam prathamapadasaṃjñitarāśitrayāt
GS41aryabhcu:7604_1: kṣayātmakāt dhanātmakam tat dvitīyapadasya yat gatam tat viśodhya śeṣam tatra kṣayaḥ eva avatiṣṭhate,
GS41aryabhcu:7605: tena tat utpannam phalam madhyamagrahe kṣayaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7606: evam dvitīyapadānte kṣayadhanayoḥ tulyatvāt na kiñcit avatiṣṭhate /
GS41aryabhcu:7611: tat etat prathamapade gatam bhujāsaṃjñitam dvitīyapade anāgatam /
GS41aryabhcu:7615: caturthapade tṛtīyapadarāśitrayāt dhanāt dhanasaṃjñitāt caturthapadarāśyādigatakṣayasaṃjñitam viśodhyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7617: caturthapadānte dhanakṣayayoḥ tulyatvāt na kiṃcit avaśiṣyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7618: tasmāt atra api sa eva arthaḥ tulādikendre bhujāphalam dhanam iti /
GS41aryabhcu:7620: yadi padeṣu sarveṣu tulyāḥ paridhayaḥ tadā evam syāt /
GS41aryabhcu:7622: atulyeṣu ca paridhiṣu pratimaṇḍalasya ca api avasthā virudhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7630: nanu ca uktam ã na ca tulyāḥ paridhayaḥ paṭhyante
GS41aryabhcu:7632: evam vijñāyate ã ete paridhayaḥ upacayā[pacayā]tmakāḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7636: tat yathā ã prathamapade kramajyām paridhyantareṇa hatvā vyāsārdhena labdham ūne viṣamapadaparidhau prakṣipyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7643: athavā bhujāphalam śīghrakrameṇa ānītam meṣādau dhanam,
GS41aryabhcu:7646: atra śīghraphalam vyāsārdhena saṃguṇayya tat utpannakrarṇena bhāgalabdham phalam dhanam ṛṇam vā /
GS41aryabhcu:7647: etat ca karma trairāśikam ã yadi vyāsārdhamaṇḍale idam phalam
GS41aryabhcu:7648: labhyate, tadā śīghroccakarṇamaṇḍale kiyat iti vyastatrairāśikena vyāsārdham guṇakāraḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7651: ucyate ã “alpe hi maṇḍale alpāḥ mahati mahāntaḥ ca rāśayaḥ jñeyāḥ” [kālakriyāí, 14] iti anena /
GS41aryabhcu:7652: atha mandoccaphalam evam kasmāt na kriyate?
GS41aryabhcu:7653: ucyate ã kriyamāṇe api tāvat eva tat phalam bhavati iti na kriyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7655: tatra ca aviśeṣitena phalena vyāsārdham saṃguṇayya karṇena bhāge hṛte pūrvam
GS41aryabhcu:7657: atha kim iti śīghroccakarṇaḥ na aviśiṣyate?
GS41aryabhcu:7659: atha atra idam praṣṭavyam ã kakṣyāmaṇḍalasya yathā svayojanakarṇaḥ vyāsārdhaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:7661: pratimaṇḍalasya api etat eva vyāsārdham iti etat /

GS41aryabhcu:7702: yathā devakattaḥ svalaṅkṛtaḥ api svam ākhyānam

GS41aryabhcu:7707: yat punar śīghroccāyātam sakṛtsaṃskṛtāt phalārdham tat sakṛtsaṃskṛtāyātam eva iti kṛtvā sakṛtsaṃskṛtaḥ eva kriyate /

GS41aryabhcu:7713: nanu ca dvikarmasiddhaḥ api madhyamaḥ eva /
GS41aryabhcu:7716: punar sphuṭamadhyamagrahaṇam kurvan ācāryaḥ jñāpayati avikṛtamadhyaḥ iti /

GS41aryabhcu:7723: ṛṇadhanayuktipradarśanārtham vyāsārdhatulyena karkaṭakena samāyāmavanau samavṛttamaṇḍalam ālikhya mātṛpitṛrekhām kuryāt /

GS41aryabhcu:7750: tena yāvat bhūtārāgrahavivarapramāṇam sūtram kakṣyāmaṇḍalamadhyāt pratimaṇḍalaparidhim padavibhāgena prasāritam yatra spṛśati,
GS41aryabhcu:7752: anye punar anyathā paṭhanti ã śanigurukujeṣu mande ardham ṛṇam dhanam bhavati pūrvam iti /

GS41aryabhcu:7760: kriyate / karmacatuṣṭayagrahaṇāt tat utpannam ca phalam tatra eva /
GS41aryabhcu:7761: tat yathā ã prāg eva śīghraphalam ānīya tat ardham ṛṇam dhanam vā mandocce kṛtvā tat mandāyātam ca tena phaladvayasaṃskṛtena mandoccena saṃskṛtaḥ sa sphuṭamadhyaḥ grahaḥ bhavati /
GS41aryabhcu:7762: sa śīghrakarmaṇā sphuṭaḥ iti prakriyāntaram etat // 22 //
GS41aryabhcu:7765: mandoccāt śīghroccāt ardham ṛṇam dhanam graheṣu mandeṣu /
GS41aryabhcu:7766: mandoccāt sphuṭamadhyāḥ śīghroccāt ca sphuṭāḥ jñeyāḥ // 23 //
GS41aryabhcu:7767: mandoccāt yat phalam āyātam tasya cāpārdham ṛṇam dhanam vā graheṣu ṛṇam dhanam [mandeṣu vā kartavyam] /
GS41aryabhcu:7769: cakāreṇa vinā graheṣu mandeṣu ca iti cārthaḥ na labhyate /

GS41aryabhcu:7777: yena sveṣu madhyameṣu sveṣu ca mandeṣu kriyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7779: svasya grahasya yaḥ madhyamaḥ svasya ca yat mandam tatra eva karmasiddheḥ /

GS41aryabhcu:7783: atha yat etat mandoccāyātam phalārdham tat kṣayadhanakrameṇa madhye grahe dhanam ṛṇam vā kriyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7786: ucyate ã mandoccam sarvadā eva grahasya ṛṇabhūtam /
GS41aryabhcu:7787: tatra yat grahasya ṛṇam tat mandocce prakṣipyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7789: yat grahe dhanabhūtam tat mandoccāt apanīyate,
GS41aryabhcu:7792: ṛṇa[ṛṇayoḥ dhana]dhanayoḥ saṃkṣepaḥ ṛṇadhanayoḥ ca viśeṣaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7793: iti / tasmāt anena krameṇa mandocce phalārdhasya upacayāpacayau bhavataḥ /

GS41aryabhcu:7798: tena tādṛgvidhena mandena madhyamāt viśodhitena yat phalam āyātam tat sakalam madhyeṣu ṛṇam dhanam vā kriyate /

GS41aryabhcu:7811: śīghroccāt ardhonam kartavyam ṛṇam dhanam svamandocce /
GS41aryabhcu:7812: sphuṭamadhyau tu bhṛgubudhau siddhāt mandāt sphuṭau bhavataḥ // 24 //

GS41aryabhcu:7817: yadi grahe ṛṇam tadā dhanam kartavyam /
GS41aryabhcu:7818: dhanasya ṛṇam kartavyam iti arthāt avasīyate /

GS41aryabhcu:7833: kakṣyāyām grahavegaḥ yaḥ bhavati sa mandanīcocce // 25 //
GS41aryabhcu:7834: tārāgrahāṇām bhuvaḥ ca yat antaram tasya ānayanopāyaḥ ucyate /
GS41aryabhcu:7835: bhūtārāgrahavivaram bhuvaḥ tārāgrahasya ca yat antaram tat bhūtārāgrahavivaram bhavati iti vakṣyati /
GS41aryabhcu:7840: etat uktam bhavati ã mandoccakarṇasya śīghroccakarṇasya ca yaḥ ghātaḥ saḥ svakarṇasaṃvargaḥ vyāsārdhahṛtaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:7843: [kakṣyāyām] grahasya yaḥ mandaśīghroccaphalajanitaḥ vegaḥ sa tasya bhūtārāgrahavivarasya agre bhavati iti /

GS41aryabhcu:7857: bhūtārāgrahavivaravaśāt vikṣepaḥ alpaḥ mahān ca nakṣatratārāgrahayogeṣu labhyate /

GS41aryabhcu:7885: atha nakṣatratārāgrahayogeṣu natilambanaparijñānārtham idam karma kriyate /

GS41aryabhcu:8293: etat ca [na] ã yāvatā niṣkrāmataḥ praviśataḥ vā grahasya tulyam idam antaram,
GS41aryabhcu:8294: tena dṛśyena vā graheṇa bhavitavyam adṛśyena vā /
GS41aryabhcu:8295: sa tāvat iṣṭakālāṃśakaiḥ dṛśyaḥ eva upalabhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:8299: eva bhāgaiḥ arkāntarasthitaḥ niṣkrāmat praviśat vā dṛśyate /
GS41aryabhcu:8300: ūnaiḥ ataḥ dṛśyate iti arthāt avagamyate,
GS41aryabhcu:8301: adhikaiḥ punar nitarām dṛśyate iti etat aśāstrajñaḥ api jānāti /
GS41aryabhcu:8303: tat yathā ã yadi triṃśatā svadeśarāśyudayakālaḥ labhyate tadā idānīm niṣpannārkagrahāntarabhāgaiḥ kaḥ iti,
GS41aryabhcu:8305: sa yadi abhīṣṭagrahāntarakālena tulyaḥ tadā asau grahaḥ dṛśyate,
GS41aryabhcu:8308: athavā svadeśarāśyudayena triṃśatā ca trairāśikam kṛtvā sarvarāśiṣu antarabhāgānayanam ã yadi rāśyudayakālena triṃśadbhāgāḥ labhyante
GS41aryabhcu:8309: tadā iṣṭagrahāntarābhihitakālena kiyantaḥ iti sarvarāśiṣu antarabhāgāḥ labhyante /
GS41aryabhcu:8310: taiḥ vā sakṛtsiddhaiḥ eva antarabhāgaiḥ iṣṭadeśe grahasya darśanam vaktavyam /
GS41aryabhcu:8313: yasmāt udayarāśivaśāt eva astam rāśayaḥ gacchanti // 4 //
GS41aryabhcu:8321: bhūḥ ca grahāḥ ca bhāni ca bhūgrahabhāni,
GS41aryabhcu:8325: ataḥ teṣām golānām ardhāni golākāraśarīrārdhāni iti yāvat /
GS41aryabhcu:8327: bhuvam tāvat anye śakaṭākārām darpaṇavṛttākārām ca manyante /
GS41aryabhcu:8329: yathā golākārā bhūḥ pratipadyate tathā uttarataḥ vakṣyāmi /
GS41aryabhcu:8330: katham punar atra amī grahāḥ golākārāḥ pratipadyante?
GS41aryabhcu:8333: anyat ca ã sthityardhādiparilekhanaprakriyā ca golākāraśarīreṣu na ghaṭate /
GS41aryabhcu:8338: tasyāḥ dṛgviṣayatvāt yathādarśanagatāni eva bimbasaṃsthānāni aṅgīkṛtya ācāryeṇa uktam /
GS41aryabhcu:8339: athavā golākāreṣu api sthityardhādyupapattiḥ śakyate vaktum /
GS41aryabhcu:8340_0: yasmāt vikṣepādayaḥ bimbamadhyāt pravṛttāḥ tāvat jñātvā golakānām bimbārdham darpaṇavṛttākāraḥ
GS41aryabhcu:8340_1: iva yathā bhraman niṣpāditaḥ samudgataḥ tasyāḥ udaram darpaṇavṛttākāram eva upalakṣyate,
GS41aryabhcu:8344: anyathā hi candramasaḥ sitakṣayavṛddhī darpaṇavṛttākāre bimbe na saṃvadete /
GS41aryabhcu:8345: tasmāt golākāraśarīrāḥ ete / uktam ca ã
GS41aryabhcu:8346: sūryaḥ agnimayaḥ golaḥ candraḥ ambumayaḥ svabhāvataḥ svacchaḥ / iti /
GS41aryabhcu:8349: tayā svacchāyayā ardhāni eṣām [vivarṇāni aprakāśātmakāni kṛṣṇāni iti arthaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:8351: yathā ghaṭasya ātapasthasya ekam pārśvam svacchāyayā eva vivarṇam,
GS41aryabhcu:8364: yadi ardhāni grahāṇām sūryābhimukhāni cakāsanti tadā kim iti candramasaḥ ardhabimbam sarvadā na cakāsti?
GS41aryabhcu:8367: ucyate ã amāvāsyāyām candramasaḥ upari ādityaḥ tadā tasya candramasaḥ upari yat bimbārdham tat aśeṣam avabhāsayati /
GS41aryabhcu:8368: candrasya amāvāsyopalakṣitoparibimbakendrāt yathā yathā paścāt ādityaḥ avalambate tathā tathā bimbakendram api aparataḥ avalambate /
GS41aryabhcu:8370: eva amāvāsyopalakṣitam bimbaparidhyardhāvadheḥ avalambate tāvat candramasaḥ bimbam asmābhiḥ upalakṣyate /
GS41aryabhcu:8372: sūryābhimukham api savitṛkarā[t chāditam api na dṛśyate] /
GS41aryabhcu:8373: tasmāt yāvat yāvat candramasaḥ bimbam savitṛbimbāt ślakṣṇam avalambate tāvān svacchaḥ candramasaḥ śuklaḥ upalakṣyate /
GS41aryabhcu:8375: tena tarhi savitṛmarīcayaḥ tu sa[lila]maye svabhāvāt eva [svaccha]candrabimbe
GS41aryabhcu:8377: yathā darpaṇe jale vā divasakarāḥ sammūrcchitāḥ santaḥ gṛhāntargatam tamaḥ kṣapayanti /
GS41aryabhcu:8379: anyat ca ã yaḥ yaḥ candrabimbapradeśāḥ savitṛmārge ṛjutvena vyavasthitaḥ sa eva śṛṅgonnatau upalabhyate, na itaraḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:8380: tathā ca tat jijñāsavaḥ karma kurvanti /
GS41aryabhcu:8381: tat yathā ã śuklapratipadādiṣu sūryārdhāstamayakālikau sūryācandramasau kṛtvā sūryonacandrotkramajyā gṛhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:8385: tena tayā utkramajyayā trairāśikam ã yadi vyāsārdhatulyayā utkramajyayā
GS41aryabhcu:8389: śuklāṣṭamyāḥ parataḥ yā sitavṛddhiḥ sā kramajyāvaśāt upacīyamānā lakṣyate iti kramajyā gṛhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:8390: tāḥ kramajyāḥ pūrvopacitavyāsārdhajyāsu prakṣipya trairāśikam kriyate /
GS41aryabhcu:8391: athavā ã tābhiḥ eva kramajyābhiḥ candrabimbārdhena trairāśikam kṛtvā yat labdham candrabimbārdhe prakṣiptam sitamānam bhavati /
GS41aryabhcu:8394: tena sūryācandramasoḥ viśeṣāt rāśiṣaṭkam apanīya tathā eva karma kriyate /
GS41aryabhcu:8396: darśanakālaḥ hi yāvantam kālam candraḥ dṛśyate /
GS41aryabhcu:8397_0: yavatā kālena udeti tat ānayanopāyaḥ ã śuklapakṣe tāvat udayarāśivaśāt eva jyotiścakragatiḥ
GS41aryabhcu:8397_1: iti ataḥ yāvantaḥ sūryāt candrarāśibhāgāḥ tāvantaḥ eva udayāvadheḥ svadeśarāśyudayaprāṇāḥ parigṛhyante /
GS41aryabhcu:8398: tat yathā ã āstamayike savitari ṣaḍrāśayaḥ parikṣipyante sa sūryāt saptamaḥ rāśiḥ bhavati /
GS41aryabhcu:8399: tathā ca candramasi ṣaḍrāśayaḥ parikṣipya sūryagatarāśibhāgān triṃśatā viśodhayet śeṣam sūryasya āgatarāśibhāgaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:8403: sūryāgatarāśibhāgān ca ṣaḍrāśiyutasūrye prakṣipya tāvat svadeśarāśyudayaprāṇāḥ saṃkalanīyāḥ yāvat ṣaḍrāśiyutacandragatāḥ bhāgāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:8404: tataḥ ṣaḍrāśiyutacandragatāḥ bhāgāḥ tat rāśyudayaprāṇaiḥ saṅguṇya triṃśatā vibhajet,
GS41aryabhcu:8406: tān pūrvasaṅkalitaprāṇān ca sarvān ekatra nyastaprāṇeṣu prakṣipya ṣaḍbhiḥ bhāgaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:8409: tāvatā kālena sūryācandramasoḥ gativiśeṣaḥ asti iti aviśeṣakarma pravartate /
GS41aryabhcu:8410: tat yathā ã yadi ṣaṣṭyā ghaṭikābhiḥ sūryabhuktiḥ candrabhuktiḥ vā labhyate tataḥ anena darśanakālena te kiyatyau tayoḥ bhuktī iti /
GS41aryabhcu:8412: candrabhuktilabdham api ṣaḍrāśiyutacandramasi prakṣipya tāvat idam kuryāt yāvat aviśeṣaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:8413: tatra yaḥ aviśiṣṭaḥ kālaḥ sa darśanakālaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:8416: yaḥ ca ṣaḍrāśiyuktaḥ candraḥ aviśiṣṭaḥ tasmāt cakrārdham apanayet tāvān candraḥ darśanakālaparisamāptau astam eti /
GS41aryabhcu:8417: atha kaścit yadi kiyatā kālena a[na]stamite savitari candrodayaḥ bhaviṣyati iti etat jijñāsuḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:8419: tat yathā ã avikṛtāstamayakālādityabhāgebhyaḥ prabhṛti tāvat prāṇāḥ saṃkalanīyāḥ yāvat avikṛtaśītāṃśoḥ gatabhāgaprāṇāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:8425: nāḍīnām yaḥ yaḥ bhogaḥ tena adhikau sūryācandramasau iti ataḥ tābhyām apanīya apanīya aviśeṣaḥ kriyate /
GS41aryabhcu:8426: aviśeṣitaḥ darśanakālaḥ tāvatā kālena divasaśeṣaḥ eva candrodayaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:8427: yaḥ asau aviśiṣṭaḥ candraḥ tāvān tatra divasaśeṣodayakāle candraḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:8428: athavā prathamānītadivasaśeṣacandrodayakālena candramasaḥ bhuktim saṅguṇayya ṣaṣṭyā vibhajet /
GS41aryabhcu:8432: tat udayalagnam tena divasaśeṣoditacandreṇa tulyam yadā,
GS41aryabhcu:8434: atha yadi tasmāt lagnāt ūnaḥ candraḥ tadā prathamataram uditaḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:8437: teṣām ca prāṇānām yāvatī candrabhuktiḥ trairāśikena labhyate tāvatī prathamadivasaśeṣoditakālacandrāt viśodhyate tāvān candraḥ divasaśeṣoditaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:8439: candraḥ ca yadā adhikaḥ tadā pūrvavat tadantaraprāṇān divasaśeṣakāle prakṣipet tāvatām prāṇānām candrabhogam candramasi prakṣipet,
GS41aryabhcu:8441: athavā prathamāstamayikacandrāt eva antarotpannadivasaśeṣakālabhogaḥ candramasaḥ viśodhya tat kālalagnakrameṇa
GS41aryabhcu:8443: atha yadi udayalagnāt candraḥ adhikaḥ tadā [kiyan]nāḍyā abhyudeti candraḥ iti tadantaraprāṇān prathamānītadivasaśeṣe prakṣipet /
GS41aryabhcu:8444: tat bhuktim candramasi prakṣipet tāvat yāvat aviśeṣaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:8445: evam udayalagnam candraḥ ca kṛtaḥ bhavati,
GS41aryabhcu:8448: paurṇamāsyām punar tāvat eva antaraghaṭikāḥ yadi dinapramāṇaghaṭikābhyaḥ ūnāḥ bhaveyuḥ tadā anastamite āditye candrodayaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:8451: ubhayatra api antarakālapramāṇena aviśeṣakarma anantarakarmavat eva /
GS41aryabhcu:8452_1: śeṣa[ghaṭikā]bhiḥ bhukiḥ trairāśikena sūryācandramasau sañcārya punar tayoḥ antaraghaṭikābhyaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:8453: śeṣaghaṭikābhiḥ candrādityau tadantarālaghaṭikāḥ iti ādyaviśeṣāntam karma kriyate,
GS41aryabhcu:8454: tatra aviśiṣṭena kālena [sūryāstamayāt paścāt candrodayaḥ / evam
GS41aryabhcu:8455: eva aviśiṣṭena kālena] sūryodayāt prāk candrodayaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:8456: atha anastamite savitari kiyatā kālena candraḥ astam yāsyati iti etat jijñāsuḥ idam karma kuryāt /
GS41aryabhcu:8457: tat yathā ã sūryodayakālotpannam candramasam kṛtvā tatra rāśiṣaṭkam prakṣipet /
GS41aryabhcu:8459: atha audayikāt ādityāt ṣaḍrāśiyuktaniśākarāvadheḥ svadeśarāśyudayavidhānena yāvatyaḥ ghaṭikāḥ tāḥ aviśeṣyante /
GS41aryabhcu:8460: katham? tāsām trairāśikena yāvat candramasaḥ bhuktiḥ tām candramasi prakṣipet iti ataḥ punar api tasmāt ādityāt
GS41aryabhcu:8461: ṣaḍrāśiyuktacandrāvadheḥ pūrvavat ghaṭikāḥ tāvat yāvat aviśeṣaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:8462: tatra yāḥ aviśeṣitāḥ ghaṭikāḥ tāvatībhiḥ divase vyatītābhiḥ candraḥ astam eti /
GS41aryabhcu:8464: atra yaḥ aviśiṣṭaḥ candraḥ sa tasmin kāle tāvān,
GS41aryabhcu:8465: yaḥ ca ṣaḍrāśiyuktaḥ candraḥ sa tasmin kāle udayalagnam iti /
GS41aryabhcu:8467: atha kaścit kiyatā kālena śuklāṣṭamyā parataḥ candraḥ gaganamadhyam avagāhate,
GS41aryabhcu:8468: kiyān vā tatra candraḥ iti jijñāsuḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:8470: atha tatkālāt parataḥ svadhiyā āsannau madhyalagnaniśākarau abhyūhya,
GS41aryabhcu:8471: tatra yadi madhyalagnaniśākarau tulyau syātām tadā tāvān candraḥ tāvatā eva kālena gaganamadhyam ārokṣyati /
GS41aryabhcu:8472: atha yadi adhikaḥ candraḥ tadā na adya api prāpnoti gaganamadhyam /
GS41aryabhcu:8474: prakṣipya madhyalagnacandrau kuryāt yāvat tulyau iti /
GS41aryabhcu:8475: atha madhyalagnāt ūnaḥ candraḥ tadā tadantarālakālam svadhiyā abhyūhita[kālāt viśodhya] madhyalagnacandrau tāvat kuryāt yāvat madhyalagnacandrau tulyau syātām /
GS41aryabhcu:8481: sa ca antarālataḥ sūryāgrayā saha ekadikkam viśeṣyate,
GS41aryabhcu:8482: yataḥ arkāt eva uttareṇa dakṣiṇena vā candraḥ sādhyate,
GS41aryabhcu:8486: evam pariniṣṭhitapramāṇam bhujā sūryāt yāmya uttarāyatā prasāryate /
GS41aryabhcu:8489: uttareṇa candraḥ tadā bhujottarāgrataḥ pūrvāparāyatā prasāryate /
GS41aryabhcu:8490: yadā dakṣiṇena candraḥ sūryāt tadā tasyāḥ bhujāyāḥ dakṣiṇāgrataḥ pūrvāparāyatā /
GS41aryabhcu:8491: evam bhujakoṭī yathāgatapramāṇena vinyasya bhujākoṭimastakāvagāhī karṇaḥ dūranirgatāgraḥ prasārya koṭyagrakarṇasampāte kendram viracya candrabimbam ālikhet /
GS41aryabhcu:8492: tasya candrabimbaparidheḥ aparataḥ karṇānusāreṇa sitamānam nītvā bindum kuryāt /
GS41aryabhcu:8496: tataḥ tābhyām pūrvavihitabindunā ca tathā chedyakavidhānena tat bindutrayaśiraḥspṛgvṛttam ālikhet /
GS41aryabhcu:8497: tasya vṛttasya candrabimbaparidheḥ ca yat antaram tat candramasaḥ śuklaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:8502: tatra yathāgatam sitamānam candrabimbapramāṇāt viśodhyam śeṣam asitam bhavati /
GS41aryabhcu:8503: tatkarṇānusāreṇa candraparidhipūrvabhāgāt bimbāntare asitamānam nītvā bindum kuryāt /
GS41aryabhcu:8504: tena dakṣiṇottarabindubhyām ca pūrvavat bindutrayaśiraḥspṛgvṛttam ālikhet /
GS41aryabhcu:8507: kṛṣṇapratipadādiṣu ca aparābhimukhaprasāritakoṭikarṇāgralikhitacandraparidhyaparabhāgāt karṇānusāreṇa asitam antaḥ pūrvavat vṛttam ālikhet /
GS41aryabhcu:8508: iṣṭakāle tu yathā pratyāsannāstodayalagnajyām arkāgrām parikalpya tatkālacandraśaṅkvagram āpādya iṣṭalagnacandrāntaraprāṇotpannaśaṅkukoṭyā candraḥ parilekhanīyaḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:8509: evam sarvatra kṣitijāt upari vyavasthitasya candrasya parilekhanaprakriyā /
GS41aryabhcu:8512: tat yathā ã samyak prasiddhagṛhodare pūrvāpararekhātaḥ uttareṇa dakṣiṇena vā parikalpitāṅgulapramāṇam arkāgrāsūtram pūrvavat prasārya bindum kuryāt /
GS41aryabhcu:8514: pūrvāpararekhāyāḥ eva dakṣiṇottarataḥ candrāgrataḥ śaṅkvagrayoḥ yogaviśeṣajyāṅgulatulyam sūtram yathā āgatadiśam prasārya bindum kuryāt
GS41aryabhcu:8519: tatra śaṅkvagrāyatadaṇḍaśirasi yathālikhitam tat chedyakasitaśṛṅgonnatim arkabindunyastadṛṣṭiḥ karṇānusāreṇa utkṣiptāvalambakāṅgulapramāṇamastakāsaktam śaśalakṣmāṇam paśyati /
GS41aryabhcu:8520: evam eva grahāḥ api gṛhodaravyavasthitaiḥ darśanīyāḥ iti /
GS41aryabhcu:8522: kṣitijamaṇḍalākrāntārdhabimbasya candramasaḥ koṭeḥ abhāvāt na parilikhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:8524: tat yathā ã yadi candrāgrā dakṣiṇena udayajyā uttareṇa tadā candramasaḥ uttaraśṛṅgam prāk pradṛśyate,
GS41aryabhcu:8526: bhavṛttacandrānusāreṇa ca sūryamarīcayaḥ candrabimbam karṇagatyā avagāhante /
GS41aryabhcu:8527: yadā punar candrāgrā uttareṇa udayajyā dakṣiṇena tadā candramasaḥ dakṣiṇaśṛṅgam
GS41aryabhcu:8532: candrāgrā yadā atiricyate tadā candramasaḥ uttaraśṛṅgam prāk pradṛśyate,
GS41aryabhcu:8534: uttareṇa yadā candrāgrā atiricyate tadā dakṣiṇaśṛṅgam prāk pradṛśyate,
GS41aryabhcu:8536: yadā punar viśeṣeṇa na kiñcit antaram tadā yugapat ubhayaśṛṅgadarśanam /
GS41aryabhcu:8537: yadā ca udayajyā candrāgre na bhavataḥ
GS41aryabhcu:8538: tadā ca astamaye candramasaḥ astalagnajyayā candrāgrayā ca śṛṅgasya prāk paścāt vā astamayam parikalpanīyam /
GS41aryabhcu:8542: tasya ekau raśmiḥ candramasam prati dīpyate /
GS41aryabhcu:8549: iti api ca nigamaḥ bhavati iti /
GS41aryabhcu:8550: tasmāt etena eva liṅgena candramārgāt upari sūryamārgaḥ iti,
GS41aryabhcu:8552: pariśiṣṭāḥ ca tārāgrahāḥ sūryamārgāt upari dūreṇa vyavasthitāḥ /
GS41aryabhcu:8553: tena teṣām ārātsthitāni golārdhāni sarvadā sakalāni eva cakāsate /
GS41aryabhcu:8554: ūrdhvamukhāḥ sūryamarīcayaḥ sadā ārādbhāgam prakāśayanti iti /
GS41aryabhcu:8555: budhaśukrayoḥ ca pratyāsannavartitvāt sarvataḥ bimbam avagāhante arkamarīcayaḥ pradīpapratyāsannagolavat tena tayoḥ api asakalabimbatābhāvaḥ / yadi
GS41aryabhcu:8556: evam astamite savitari katham ete grahādayaḥ cakāsate savitṛkarābhāvāt ?
GS41aryabhcu:8559: tena uparimukhānām sūryamarīcīnām na vyavadhānāya bhūḥ vartate /
GS41aryabhcu:8560: yathā ghaṭasya upari adhaḥ dūreṇa avasthitasya pradīpasya ghaṭaḥ na vyavadhānakāraṇam /
GS41aryabhcu:8561: kṛṣṇapakṣapratipadādiṣu candramasaḥ bimbapūrvabhāgaḥ pratyāsannaḥ savituḥ iti tena tat śuklam upalabhyate /
GS41aryabhcu:8562: ratnānām ca ādityakarāḥ eva dīptikāraṇatvam prapadyate / tena tāni
GS41aryabhcu:8565: bhānoḥ ca bhāsām anuvedhayogam āsādya raśmiprakareṇa dūram /
